Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.inputHandler

Provides for classes to handle different aspects of user input.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExportImage
    A class used to export the current view of the map to an image.
    ImageExportHandler  
    InputEventHandler
    Handles keyboard and mouse events on the GView map.
    MouseOverHandler
    Handles MouseOver events for items on the GView map.
    PanEventHandler
    Handles pan events on the GView map.
    PopupInputEventHandler
    This class is responsible for handling the PInput events that would result in a popup and handles those events appropriately.
    SelectHandler
    Handles selection of specific items and features on the GView map.
    ToolTipHandler
    Used to handle the tool-tip item that is displayed.
    ZoomSubject
    Handles zooming in GView.

Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.inputHandler Description

Provides for classes to handle different aspects of user input.
